metadata.name: ✦ AMALGAMATION ✦
metadata.description:
Portraying the fusion of human intellect and AI, Amalgamation is the exploration of my curiosity about experimenting & learning new tools.

Initially enabled by AI and later synthesized with visual effects, it is an experience in the form of an illustration and a cinematic short, available in Augmented Reality (AR).

AR-enabled on digital and print media via Artivive Mobile App - https://artivive.com

⭑⭑⭑

Image specs:  
4167 × 4167 px | 150 PPI  
30.9 MB | PNG

⭑⭑⭑

Human x AI

attributes.value: OpenAI, After effects, Photoshop, Artivive app
